subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Thousands of fans filed into Citizens Bank Park to bid farewell to the legendary broadcaster Harry Kalas, the voice of the Philadelphia Phillies. Kalas, the Hall of Fame announcer known for his signature “Outta here!” home run call, died Monday in Washington. He collapsed in the broadcast booth before a game against the Nationals. He was 73.
